titles.title: Pharmacy Benefit Manager Accountability Study Act of 2019

To require the Comptroller General of the United States to study the role pharmacy benefit managers play in the pharmaceutical supply chain and to provide Congress with appropriate policy recommendations, and for other purposes.
Pharmacy Benefit Manager Accountability Study Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary:
Pharmacy Benefit Manager Accountability Study Act of 2019
This bill requires the Government Accountability Office to study the role of pharmacy benefit managers (PBMs) with respect to federally facilitated exchanges, including the role of PBMs in pharmaceutical supply chains, the competition among PBMs, and the use of rebates and fees by PBMs in such exchanges.
